website_summaries.verdict: The priciest serum on this list, but a cult favorite from a trusted French brand for good reason.
pros: This luxurious beautifying oil works on hair, nails, and skin
Helps the skin produce natural collagen to smooth signs of fine lines

customer_reviews.title: As a license Esthi I have access to a lot of different products but honestly this is the best OTC organic serum
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of my holy grails! As a license Esthi I have access to a lot of different products but honestly this is the best OTC organic serum; it brightens, smooths out your complexion and nourishes. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. St Croix

customer_reviews.title: red faced people take note
customer_reviews.text: My skin tends to be red around my cheeks and nose, and i see a difference immediately when I use this serum. . Causes me to need less concealer. The cleanser in this line is is also very gentle, and I like to use it after a glycolic peel. If you dont see a difference, you probably dont have sensitive skin bad enough to need it. I was an aesthetician for 25 years.
customer_reviews.author: deborah albers

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients in Andalous Naturals changed for the worse at the same time as their change from green ...
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients in Andalous Naturals changed for the worse at the same time as their change from green bottles to purple. If you compare the previous and current ingredients, they're terrible. I'm very, very disappointed in Andalous Naturals. That which once made my complexion flawless has now caused my face havoc. It's now red, blotchy, and bumpy. Thanks Andalous Naturals for disregarding every concept of continuous improvement and selling the crap at the bottom of your garbage disposal. Take this to heart, as I was a customer of Andalous Naturals 5 years- having initially discovered them at a health food store.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymousse

customer_reviews.title: Esthetician recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Will repurchase again and again. AMAZING FOR REDNESS REDUCTION. I am a licensed esthetician. I recommend this product to a lot of my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: it is not the real product, i have bought ...
customer_reviews.text: it is not the real product, i have bought this product before and this filled with something else. item can't be returned so not sure what is in the bottle, as my skin is very sensitive afraid some chemical my face my react to. very disappointing someone would do such.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stack

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Used for years!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Andalou products for years. This is my go-to anti-aging serum. Delicious, light scent and creamy soft texture. A little goes a long way. I switched to this a few years ago when my other products weren’t keeping the fine lines at bay as much as I wanted. This mixed with the Andalou DMAE moisturizer has done a great job and I love my skin, especially around the eyes. I barely wear makeup anymore! Can’t beat a good product with good-for-you-and-the-environment ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I think it works for fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference when using this. I have very fine lines around my eyes. Nothing to really worry about at this point but I did notice after continuous use that the fine lines around my eyes and forehead started to disappear. I really like this product. When I can't pick it up at Whole Foods, I order it at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Whispering willow

customer_reviews.title: simply the best
customer_reviews.text: by far the best vit c serum out there. i tried several vit c and they usually cost 50- 100$ at least but andalous the best one! this is the second bottle i used with one month interval and i noticed the difference right away when i stopped. my face started getting dull. i purchased my second bottle and less than 2 weeks after, my skin got brighter and my pores got smaller! i won’t look and purchase any other vit c serum other than andalous until they stop manufacturing this one! i find amazons price the cheapest as well! i have been recommending the serum to anybody that asked me what i used for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly H.

customer_reviews.title: Faded Facial Scarring!
customer_reviews.text: This product has lightened my facial scarring from a bad accident, and seems to help with occasional acne. I layer it under a heavier nighttime moisturizer or sunscreen. Very reasonably priced. Vitamin C potency deteriorates quickly once the product is opened, so I keep it in a dry, dark place, and replace it every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Grippin

customer_reviews.title: Took a while, but working
customer_reviews.text: updated: After a few weeks I am finally seeing improvement in my life size. The largest pores look like they are maybe a little better but the medium to large pores have definitely shrunk! I am hoping this continues and isn’t a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bureau

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same product from the store before. This is different than the store that I got from it feel different on the skin and smell different.. very disappointed Amazon would allow fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Azure Cheuk Ying Ng

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial serum. My skin is combination with some oiliness at the t-zone. I use it morning and night right after washing my face and it feels great on my skin. It pumps out just the right amount for me and soaks in wonderfully. Prepares my face for my a.m. or p.m. moisturizer perfectly. AND the fact that it's vegan and cruelty free is a huge bonus. I will be sticking with this serum!
customer_reviews.author: teasy

customer_reviews.title: Significantly damaged my skin with only sporadic use.
customer_reviews.text: This had a 5 star rating on beautypedia, and I have no idea how. It absolutely destroyed my skin, using it once a week or less for a few weeks. It’s been weeks since, with intensive work to repair the damage, and it’s still not back to normal yet. I’ve used other vitamin c products before without this sort of issue, so I don’t know why this one was so bad. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, even-toned skin, naturally
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with andalou products. I'm on a mission to try them all! All of the andalou skin care products I've incorporated into my routine have been transformative. This product is no exception. I've been using regularly (1-2 times a day) for a couple weeks and see results. My skin is more even in tone and feels more elastic and supple. My skin is so even and clear right now it almost looks like I'm wearing foundation. Quality, affordable, natural, nutrient rich and cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shirk

customer_reviews.title: definitely a must have
customer_reviews.text: i love this product. First off, it smells great. It does smell like roses, and it isn't too strong/overwhelming. Secondly, it absorbs well into my skin. It doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy or dry. I apply argan oil afterwards and the 2 combined is perfect. I have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn't cause breakouts. I will continue to include this product as well as the foaming cleanser in my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product. My skin is tighter and smoother. I have been using for a couple months now and love this serum. All of the Andalou Naturals products I use are great. My skin has never looked better or felt better. Thank you for truly wonderful vegan, cruelty-free products!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: High end product
customer_reviews.text: My skin is Glowing!! This is my go to favorite!! You don’t need Clinique expensive vitamin C serum. This is 10x better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE TURNER

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY sensitive skin. This serum is smooth and non irritating. It somehow calms and gives a fresh, young beauty to my skin. Made my skin look even toned and youthful. I don't know how else to describe it. I noticed the difference in the way my skin looks the next morning after I put it in. Really good stuff. I use it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4boys

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for one day and broke out in terrible welts and acne. Took me a lot of time to clear my skin up from this product. I know this is supposed to be for acne but sensitive and acne types beware.
customer_reviews.author: bengalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got both this serum and the Night Cream Love the serum, the Night Cream is way too heavy for my 63 year old sensitive skin, will use on body. Did get the 1000 roses Day Cream and adore it!
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: At age 40-something, I am new to using facial products at all. Too many are based on crazy petro-chemicals, etc. I discovered Andalou products a few months ago, and am so impressed! This serum is great. I saw results after one use. Other reviews mentioned that the product did not sink into the skin, but it immediately does on mine. Smells great, not at all like chemicals (which is what turns me away from so many “health” products.) Cannot recommend highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works especially well when I used with the rest of the Andalou Revitalize products.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Andalou skin care line! I started using the Andalou Fruit Stem Cell Serum about a year ago along with the Revitalize basic skin care products. The results were almost immediately noticable on my ageing skin. The serum is really an important addition to the Revitalize line and I wouldn't want to be without it! Neither would my skin which now looks healthy and and my wrinkles are less noticeable! This product works!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Consistency is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I tried about 4 different vitamin c serums from different retailers that have 10k+ reviews and was not as pleased as this one. Its light on my skin and I can see that consistency is very much as those high end serums. If you did not find a fave vitamin c serum, trust me give this one a try and you will fall in love. As a reference I have mixed skin prone to acne and I apply the serum with a face roller for excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Iris C

customer_reviews.title: So good!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought this line. After washing my face put use one pump and rub this over my face and neck before the moisturizer. Since using this line my face has been brighter, smoother and clearer than it ever has been before.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Landers

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for Andalou Naturals. Unfortunately it did nothing to help my oily, acne prone skin as advertised. I used this with the full line of products designed for oily, acne prone skin and noticed no difference at all after 2 months. I'm still using it, because I paid a lot for all 3 products in this line. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Meh It’s okay but definitely not my favorite serum, I can’t say much about it because I’ve only been using it for a couple days but it does kind of leave a sticky/oily feel and look on my face afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: good ingredients but leaves the skin feeling matte and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is deffinatly more comparable to a salon quality serum, good ingredients but leaves the skin feeling matte and smooth, not oily and dewy in appearance. I personally tend to go more for true facial oils vs. the matte appearance. It does look great and if you are looking for a more natural version of a chemical based cosmetic counter product I think you'll be happy with this. It is nice under the cc cream of the same line. More of a morning product then a night product when you would want to really pack the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused pimples, didn't like smell
customer_reviews.text: The scent smells very realistically like fruit to me, too much so. It smells like I'm spreading overripe/rotting fruit on my face. I really wanted to like the product, but each time I used it, I got at least one big, deep pimple (I almost never get those). I would wait for the pimple to heal, and then try again with the serum -- boom, the next day, another pimple forming. Luckily my skin returned to normal after I stopped using the serum.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Product Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased and felt confident with my first order of Andalou, I was delighted with the ingredients and the texture as I applied it to my skin. However, the second order that was sent to me automatically appears to have been watered down and the feel was different as I applied it to my skin. For that reason I give the overall rating a "3". I found this very disappointing because I thought I had finally found a dependable moisturizing serum.
customer_reviews.author: Averri Liggins

customer_reviews.title: Good results but Unstable product
customer_reviews.text: This was my fave Vit C serum as it performs well & results are noticeable, but the bottle I purchased here turned orange right away which means it’s unstable. I now use a different Vit C serum. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: A.MA.ZING !
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about Andalou's Tumeric + C serum. I have sensitive, combination skin - have been looking for a Vitamin C serum that's clean, gentle, and overall good for my 40+ skin. Have been using 100% organic products the past 2 years (mostly essential oils that I mix up myself). Was nervous to try Andalou - and so happy I did! Its been gradual - but the GLOW from the turmeric + C combo is the REAL DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: lol

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a nurse practitioner friend of mine. She uses this at night, and the coconut firming lotion in the morning. My face is super sensitive, but this doesn't affect it. In fact, my face is more even toned, more vibrant, and I look younger than I did previously to using this. I didn't take a before picture or I'd show a comparison, but highly recommend! I have also had these for 3 months now and have half a bottle left of each. I just use a pea size amount each time. Also vitamin C draws more sun to your skin, so please use this at night or use SPF during the day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angi Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Love this line.
customer_reviews.text: I was told that I should start using a serum, and I already use this brand and line of face lotion and rose water spray. So I got this serum, and an exfoliating facial wash of the same line. I’m not sure if it’s doing anything, but I have been happy with this brands other products. Hard to separate it out sometimes!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Banished my large pores
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is my second time purchasing the Pure Pore Serum because it works great. My enlarged pores and super oily skin have changed tremendously. The only con is that it has made my skin a bit dry, but I'll take a little dryness over the slick oiliness I had to deal with any day of the week. I plan to continue purchasing this product. Thanks, Jeanine H.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.text: 1st i want to say that I have try this exact same product which I bought at my local store. I fell in love with this product an was depress when I ran out so i found it on amazon an decide to try it out big mistake. When I got the package it look the same as the one I bought at the store. From one pump of it I can tell it was not the same because it smell like chemicals with a strong orange smell also made my face break out but it look exactly like I wanted to be the same thing so bad but it wasn’t, I would not repurchase this aging.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Anontaxay

customer_reviews.title: Andalou products are so gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: The facial serum is truly gentle fast absorbing skin feels so soft my first month using it and have purchased a second andalou brand is so good I used several of their products
customer_reviews.author: B F

customer_reviews.title: People with Flaxseed oil allergy..beware!
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes for this product as it has some very good ingredients. Soon after starting to use this products I started to feel burning skin, stuffy nose etc. I am allergic to Flax seeds and this product has flax seed oil in it. so as much as I would love to give this product a good review, I couldn't. Sorry. Should've read the label one more time before purchasing as this item is not eligible for returns. :(
customer_reviews.author: amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: grape kool-aid smell
customer_reviews.text: It has a good ingredient list and I am sure it is helping my skin, but I cannot imagine I will repurchase because it has a very strong grape smell that makes me nauseous for the first few hours that I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I took a chance on it as I have super sensitive skin. This is light but very moisturizing and after a week I have noticed a difference in my skin: Softer and retains moisture better. This brand is really a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite serum of all time. My skin is extremely dry and sensitive, so a lot of products irritate my skin. But this whole line from Andalou Naturals is absolutely wonderful. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best serum for my skin
customer_reviews.text: My favorite serum, very light yet powerful to erase dark spots and to illuminate my skin, been using it for years and hope they never discontinue it. Combined with the spf 30 su lock from the same line is the perfect combo for daytime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make me breakout.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've used it once and I've already noticed that my face is brighter and also my pores look smaller. I haven't noticed anything concerning discoloration yet though but I'm hoping that it'll work on that too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The serum has been great for my red, sensitive skin BUT last two times I ordered they sent me the Moroccan Oil instead. The bubble wrap packaging is labelled for the serum but unfortunately inside is the oil. I tried using the oil the first time it was incorrectly sent but it doesn't work for me nearly as well. Disappointing issue as I really liked this serum. Won't be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Jaclew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent serum brightens skin smells Devine best product I’ve found great price
customer_reviews.text: This serum is fabulous light airy and fresh orange scent and glides on your skin quick absorbing feels wonderful brightens skin saw results and firmness within a few days I love it great price I’ve tried other serums and this is the best I’ve found
customer_reviews.author: Patty cakes 57

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Using this with all the other products in this line, I have seen a huge difference in the way my skin feels and looks. I will never buy nothing else except the Andalou line.
customer_reviews.author: Mutton

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product, but I received the item completely shattered, and of course it is non-returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lee Van Sickle

customer_reviews.title: Love them but got the wrong item!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Andalou products, so far, all of them, face products, hair products, hand cream. The problem is I ordered the serum and I got the night cream! 😫 I wanted to try the firming serum. This is not returnable, what can I do!!??
customer_reviews.author: Santos Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tacky, smells like oranges!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like snot poured out of the bottle, smells like fresh citrus. It leaves an ever so slightly tacky feeling. It’s not extremely moisturizing. I use this as a base layer with a much more potent moisturizer over it. However, it’s EWG approves!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't broken me out and doesn't make me any more oily. I can't say that I notice any change in my skin at all though. I have several things from andalou that I LOVE but this one is underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Cakies

customer_reviews.title: My favorite serum
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second bottle of this serum. I love it. Smells like fresh, clean roses. Very light and moisturizing. I will continue to order this from amazon as long as the price is cheaper than my local health food stores. I use this at night right after I have showered and cleansed my face.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Add to cart!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Saw a difference in my skins tone & texture in one use! Do not hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: citygal

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who rate this product, but is such a waste of money. I can get better products at the 99 Cents store
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: Second bottle that I have received that has been broken the package is completely wet from product
customer_reviews.author: Sharasia

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the past month. I really like it. I do feel like my skin is brighter. I also have sensitive skin and fear adding in new products but I have not had any break outs from this products. It has become a staple in my daily routein.
customer_reviews.author: keri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product that I’ve used for several years. However, this is my 1st experience with this seller. Notice in the picture the seller put the wrong label as this is actually Youth Night Cream. Refund option NOT avail. I purchased 2 and Now I’m out of $30. You don’t always get what you pay for...BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Montez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This makes MTV face feel great. I can really tell the difference when I use it. All the other products in this line are awesome as well
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Stone

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this is amazing. All you need is one pump. After first use my skin cleared up, no redness around my t-zone. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AZM

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Effective Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Ditch all your serums and try this instead. The driest skin will respond , without a greasy effect. Wonderful under makeup. The night creme is a dream as well! Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite serum
customer_reviews.text: After going through multiple serum formulations lately, many of which caused me to break out, this is the one I've stuck with. Lovely scent. Light. Moisturizing as advertised. Have started using their entire line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Lafter The Fact

customer_reviews.title: Andalou is great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients, quality and price of andalou products. I have been using it for over a year now. I've tried different ones and haven't found anything I don't like!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Really hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Bough this cause it had nice reviews. Wasnt disappointed. In my specific case I had lines in my skin due to being really dehydrated. So, this serums did the job. My face is really plump and smooth. I dont like the scent of this serum though.,.. but nothing else from that. Edit: this contains alcohol, so, it will dry your skin if u dont use moisturizer and DONT use it w dermaroller, care.
customer_reviews.author: mariel ailin cassino

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t see a difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking it was going to change my face but I haven’t noticed a difference. I’m almost done with bottle and I believe I should see a difference by now. I have dry skin patches and it dried them out even more. I will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Hrndz

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the product
customer_reviews.text: having been using this product for a month and it hasn't done anything to improve my dark circles and I have to put something else on my face for MOISTURIZER
customer_reviews.author: tonyala

customer_reviews.title: Rose Facial Serum
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have hypersensitive skin and this serum doesn't irritate my face or cause breakouts. So happy to have found this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. I had hard time finding perfect serum. This products is light and smells like rose and gentle to skin. It's not oily nor sticky. My skin absorbed it right away. It feels amazing. Highly recommended for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angel's Love

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This is SO hydrating. It sinks into my almost-40 skin and makes it feel so silky. I love it. I will probably buy the moisturizer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So tiny for the high price
customer_reviews.text: Well I love these products haven’t tried this yet but so disappointed in the teany tiny size. I’m hoping it is a miracle worker at this price. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: ADi

customer_reviews.title: Another great Andalou product
customer_reviews.text: I love Andalou products! I’ve used many many products ranging from very expensive to well priced Andalou. I am really pleased with this product and many of their other products in this vitamin C line. Definitely recommend. Very high-quality for the comparatively low price.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great serum: effective, lightweight, non-sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying this serum. It has made the appearance of my light acne scarring much better, has improved the overall texture of my skin, has made my pores look smaller, and I feel like it even prevents or helps heal breakouts. The serum goes on light and smooth. It does not have an overwhelming (citrus-y) smell like other vitamin C products. I am sensitive to strong fragrances, so this is another plus. I have been using this serum twice daily since I've received it, that's how much I am in love with it. I also like most of Andalou's masks. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mitobe

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just the right amount of moisture for my oily combo skin! I can run sensitive to various ingredients, like dimethicone, which this has NONE of! Just working to find the right balance of serum and moisturizer to keep me hydrated, but not oily. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina D

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, I feel my skin is getting smoother. Love this product for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love this product...fragrance is wonderful, smooths my skin and I’m am starting to notice an age spot is fading
customer_reviews.author: jerri l cannon

customer_reviews.title: not the best but not the worst serum I have used
customer_reviews.text: Ok, not the best but not the worst serum I have used. It hasn't caused any issues with my skin but will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kinney's

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a few years it is easy to use and makes your skin feel great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was broken in 2
customer_reviews.text: could tell something was wrong when plastic wrapped box was squishy. Bottle inside was broken, product spilled out, unusable.
customer_reviews.author: matthew lamy

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective for skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin and rosacea. Reasonable price. Bought it again and other products.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Applying it feels great on my skin after using a toner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for well over a year and will continue using it. Applying it feels great on my skin after using a toner.
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I live in a dry climate, and this is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Really Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This serum is great. It doesn't have as much anti-aging guts as the purple bottle, but I don't think it's meant to. Really nice formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: Hi purchased 2 of Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Absolute Serum, 1 Ounce for $19.42 each And 2 of Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Moroccan Beauty Oil, 1 Ounce for $14.72. I received 3 of Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Moroccan Beauty Oil and only 1 Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Absolute Serum. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Sansoma

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, evens skin tone!
customer_reviews.text: Its very lightweight, i love this product made my skin more even toned. I would definitely keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: Paola Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Brightened and evened tone of my skin within a week. Love it! Smells lovely like real citrus.
customer_reviews.author: ciennakay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A couple days in and I can honestly start seeing the difference! Love it will continue to purchase more :)
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo segovia

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, smells great and it works well for my skin. I don’t think its oily at all and is a good base, as a serum, for moisturizer. I used to get it a very expensive natural foods store for $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I use this under my vitamin e moisturizer. I like how it feels going on and that it seems to help my foundation glide on nicely. No need for a primer when I use it and the smell is not too strong. Just right. I’m the worst at trying to tell the difference it makes in my skin but I Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: glo-torch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Andalou products. Glad I can get a better price on Amazon than buying it at Whole Foods
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Great  all around product for sens skin!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product!!! use morning and night! 2nd purchase ! love it and smells great plus i have sens skin!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wethington

customer_reviews.title: A permanent product in my skincare regiment
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products ive found to keep my skin clear and moisturized. Its light and non-greasy.
customer_reviews.author: BeaAnne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for face eczema/dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have severely dry and sensitive skin with some face eczema. This serum is so magical. Soothing and deeply moisturizing. Main ingredient is aloe Vera but it is not sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Swoods

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Like it.. I have dry skin so this I use under a thicker moisturizer. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum, this is my 4th time purchasing it. Its light, yet moisutizing
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: I love the Andalou products.
customer_reviews.text: seems to help with redness and sensitive skin. I will order it again. I use several of the Andalou creams and they all work great for me. (60+ year old skin)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it does anything to improve my skin but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't hydrate dry skin much and not sure if it does anything to improve my skin but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany s.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it brings moisture and brightness to my skin
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Niemann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this skin care serum. I mis one pump with a pump of organic Argan oil with great results on my face and neck. Product lasts a long time and is odorless. Great on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley G.

customer_reviews.title: Superior affordable serum
customer_reviews.text: Best serum ever my skin has improved a lot. Use daily
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: I love how this works. My face looked more even after using only a few times. Scent is light and goes on light.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I liked this.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this....at first. Then it started to leave my face a little bit itchy. I can highly recommend almost every other andalau products i've used though!
customer_reviews.author: Mal_pal

customer_reviews.title: My skin is glowing
customer_reviews.text: Completely changed my skin! This product works wonders, I’ve been using religiously for a few months and have noticeably brighter and more even skin tone.. I will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rundquist

customer_reviews.title: Nice healthy glow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for quite some time. It’s a serum so it won’t be moisturizing. Use in conjunction with your favorite night cream. I like the nice healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

product_meta.title: Andalou Naturals Willow Bark Pure Pore Serum, 1.1 Ounce
product_meta.description: Style Name:Willow Bark Pure PoreAndalou Naturals Willow Bark Pure Pore Serum, 1.1 Ounce
feature_bullets: Pore Serum: Gently cleanses and calms pores for a clear, balanced complexion. Argan stem cells help soothe skin to promote a clear, refreshed, and ageless appearance. Great for acne-prone skin
Inspired by Nature: Willow bark and salicylic acid help purify pores, curb bacteria, absorb excess oil, and fade the appearance of post-blemish pigmentation. Aloe vera hydrates and calms inflammation

Vegan Ingredients: Andalou Naturals products are 98% nature-derived, Non-GMO Project Verified and vegetarian with a large vegan offering. Plus, we're gluten-free and cruelty-free and never test on animals
Fruit Stem Science: A blend of nature’s most potent bioactive stem cells from the Heirloom Apple, Grape, Swiss Alpine Rose, Argan Tree and Hemp Plant support skin protection, restoration and radiance
Ultimate Skincare: We believe you should never have to compromise ethics in favor of efficacy. Indulge in our range of toners, cleansers, lotions, masks, wrinkle creams, shampoos and deodorants

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
